name: God of War: Ghost of Sparta
description:
Reveal the true story behind Kratos' tragic past and the meteoric rise to his seat on Mount Olympus.

*    Journey with Kratos in a brutal and destructive rampage through the dark world of the Greek gods as he uncovers his cursed history.
*    Unleash total chaos with awesome new weapons at your disposal; and perfect your skills with a range of agile new combat moves.
*    Featuring the latest visual technology and enhanced texture resolutions to deliver a realistic feel; coupled with fluid, lifelike characters, a robust weapon system, new magical powers and navigational abilities.
